titles.title: There's a deep down cry, there's a cry in my heart

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There's a deep down cry, there's a cry in my heart
To be free from sin and death. (2)
Open my eyes to behold the things you're doing in the earth
Open my ears that I might hear Your voice so still
Open my eyes to behold the things You're doing in the earth
There's a deep down cry to be free,
To be free, to be free, There's a deep down cry to be free.(2)
